Html: I'm trying to restyle the column headers in a data grid so that the contents will be displayed vertically rather than horizontally. I've looked at a few examples of applying a new style to the column header and they all use DataGridColumnHeader. However, it seems in the latest release that DataGridColumnHeader doesn't exist! I checked the source code and it's not there. What happened? And what target type do I use for my column header style?
Ok, now I see it. It's in Microsoft.Windows.Controls.Primitives instead of Microsoft.Windows.Controls
